text: Jaba allāhabāṭa ādēśa bhayō ki īsā. Mailē timrō sansāramā rahanē avadhi parā garī timīlā'ī āphatira uṭhā'unē ra timīlā'ī kāphiraharabāṭa pavitra garnēchu. Ra, timrō anuśaraṇa garnēharalā'ī kāphirahara bhandā śaktiśālī banā'unē chu kayāmatakō dina sam'ma, ani timī sabai ma chē'u pharkēra ā'unēchau, ta juna kurāmā timīhara vivāda gardathyau, tyasa dina tyasakō nirṇaya mailē nai garnēchu
